# .gitignore for an ASP.NET Core project

## Visual Studio Code ##
.vscode
.history
.cache

## Visual Studio ##
*.obj
*.exe
*.dll
*.pdb
*.user
*.aps
*.pch
*.vspscc
*_i.c
*_p.c
*.ncb
*.suo
*.tlb
*.tlh
*.bak
*.cache
*.ilk
*.log
*.lib
*.sbr
*.sdf
ipch/
[Dd]ebug/
[Rr]elease/
[Rr]eleases/
x64/
x86/
[Ss]tyle[Cc]op.*
*.[Rr]e[Ss]harper
_ReSharper*/
[Tt]est[Rr]esult*

## Rider ##
.idea/

## User-specific files ##
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

## Mono Auto Generated Files ##
mono_crash.*

## Windows image file caches ##
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db

## Folder config file ##
Desktop.ini

## Recycle Bin used on file shares ##
$RECYCLE.BIN/

## VS Code ##
.vscode/
.history/
.vscode-test/

## Windows Installer files ##
*.cab
*.msi
*.msm
*.msp
